titles.title: Marine Turtle Conservation Reauthorization Act of 2008
To reauthorize the Marine Turtle Conservation Act of 2004.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, and Oceans.

bill.summary:
9/10/2008--Introduced.
Marine Turtle Conservation Reauthorization Act of 2008 - Reauthorizes the Marine Turtle Conservation Act of 2004 through FY2014.
